entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
